quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
author: T. E. Lawrence

quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
author: James Dean

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky; then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of being a butterfly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am a man?
author: Zhuangzi

quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.
author: Joy Page

quote: You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I close my eyes, then I drift away, into the magic night I softly say. A silent prayer, like dreamers do, then I fall asleep to dream my dreams of you.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
author: Eva Green

quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.
author: M. C. Escher

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
author: John Barrymore

quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
author: Michael Korda

quote: I was always a dreamer, in childhood especially. People thought I was a little strange.
author: Charley Pride

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.
author: Katie Holmes

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: You can plant a dream.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: Hold fast to dreams For when dreams go Life is a barren field Frozen with snow.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams.
author: E. V. Lucas

quote: God's gifts put man's best dreams to shame.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: People are so busy dreaming the American Dream, fantasizing about what they could be or have a right to be, that they're all asleep at the switch. Consequently we are living in the Age of Human Error.
author: Florence King

quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: When we can't dream any longer we die.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: That's what keeps me going: dreaming, inventing, then hoping and dreaming some more in order to keep dreaming.
author: Joseph Barbera

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
author: Usher

quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
author: Mary Webb

quote: This is the city of dreamers and time and again it's the place where the greatest dream of all, the American dream, has been tested and has triumphed.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: People need dreams, there's as much nourishment in 'em as food.
author: Dorothy Gilman

quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
author: Paracelsus

quote: I tell people I'm too stupid to know what's impossible. I have ridiculously large dreams, and half the time they come true.
author: Debi Thomas

quote: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: No one should negotiate their dreams. Dreams must be free to fly high. No government, no legislature, has a right to limit your dreams. You should never agree to surrender your dreams.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Only the dreamer shall understand realities, though in truth his dreaming must be not out of proportion to his waking.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming.
author: Akira Kurosawa

quote: Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer.
author: Jim Bakker

quote: Anyone who has spent any time in space will love it for the rest of their lives. I achieved my childhood dream of the sky.
author: Valentina Tereshkova

quote: We are near waking when we dream we are dreaming.
author: Novalis

quote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Our dreams drench us in sense, and sense steeps us again in dreams.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I think we dream so we don't have to be apart so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can play together all night.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Take everything easy and quit dreaming and brooding and you will be well guarded from a thousand evils.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: My dreams were all my own; I accounted for them to nobody; they were my refuge when annoyed - my dearest pleasure when free.
author: Mary Shelley

quote: I'll tell you this: You have to remember to chase and catch your dreams, because if you don't, your imagination will live in empty spaces, and that's nowhere land.
author: Gary Busey

quote: I have always been amazed at the way an ordinary observer lends so much more credence and attaches so much more importance to waking events than to those occurring in dreams... Man... is above all the plaything of his memory.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Dreaming men are haunted men.
author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: I dream that someday the step between my mind and my finger will no longer be needed. And that simply by blinking my eyes, I shall make pictures. Then, I think, I shall really have become a photographer.
author: Alfred Eisenstaedt

quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Everybody's a dreamer.
author: John Lithgow

quote: All men of action are dreamers.
author: James Huneker

quote: Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: We all dream; we do not understand our dreams, yet we act as if nothing strange goes on in our sleep minds, strange at least by comparison with the logical, purposeful doings of our minds when we are awake.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: In bed my real love has always been the sleep that rescued me by allowing me to dream.
author: Luigi Pirandello

quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams.
author: Herb Brooks

quote: It's when children are 15, 16 or 17 that they decide whether they want to be a doctor, an engineer, a politician or go to the Mars or moon. That is the time they start having a dream, and that's the time you can work on them. You can help them shape their dreams.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Dreaming of a tomorrow, which tomorrow, will be as distant then as 'tis today.
author: Lope de Vega

quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
author: John Locke

quote: A daydream is an evasion.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Our fathers had their dreams; we have ours; the generation that follows will have its own. Without dreams and phantoms man cannot exist.
author: Olive Schreiner

quote: The dreamer can know no truth, not even about his dream, except by awaking out of it.
author: George Santayana

quote: Dreaming or awake, we perceive only events that have meaning to us.
author: Jane Roberts

quote: Married or unmarried, young or old, poet or worker, you are still a dreamer, and will one time know, and feel, that your life is but a dream.
author: Donald G. Mitchell

quote: To become an astronaut, someone has to have a dream of his own to do something that he or she has always wanted to do, then commit himself to making that dream come true.
author: Gene Cernan

quote: Judge of your natural character by what you do in your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I challenge you to be dreamers; I challenge you to be doers and let us make the greatest place in the world even better.
author: Brian Schweitzer

quote: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.
author: Paracelsus

quote: Reverie is when ideas float in our mind without reflection or regard of the understanding.
author: John Locke

quote: Writers write. Dreamers talk about it.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: We should never discourage young people from dreaming dreams.
author: Lenny Wilkens

quote: Was it only by dreaming or writing that I could find out what I thought?
author: Joan Didion

quote: Night is the mother of counsels.
author: George Herbert

quote: Sometimes I wake at night in the White House and rub my eyes and wonder if it is not all a dream.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: Dreams are a scientific fact.
author: Robyn Hitchcock

quote: I was a great dreamer of day dreams.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: I've always said that one night, I'm going to find myself in some field somewhere, I'm standing on grass, and it's raining, and I'm with the person I love, and I know I'm at the very point I've been dreaming of getting to.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
author: David Bailey

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: Gail Devers

quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.
author: Kalpana Chawla

quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
author: Rachel Corrie

quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
author: Donovan Bailey

quote: Stay true to yourself, yet always be open to learn. Work hard, and never give up on your dreams, even when nobody else believes they can come true but you. These are not cliches but real tools you need no matter what you do in life to stay focused on your path.
author: Phillip Sweet

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
author: LL Cool J

quote: Life without dreams is like a bird with a broken wing - it can't fly.
author: Dan Pena

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Grit is that 'extra something' that separates the most successful people from the rest. It's the passion, perseverance, and stamina that we must channel in order to stick with our dreams until they become a reality.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: Your dreams are what define your individuality. They have the power to give you wings and make you fly high.
author: P. V. Sindhu

quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
author: Edward Kennedy

quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: You control your future, your destiny. What you think about comes about. By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands - your own.
author: Mark Victor Hansen

quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: What I love about America is not necessarily the American Dream but the fact that there's so much spirit of fighting to continue to dream once the dreams are broken.
author: Chloe Zhao

quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: We need time to defuse, to contemplate. Just as in sleep our brains relax and give us dreams, so at some time in the day we need to disconnect, reconnect, and look around us.
author: Laurie Colwin

quote: Follow your dreams. If you have a goal, and you want to achieve it, then work hard and do everything you can to get there, and one day it will come true.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: The American Dream has run out of gas. The car has stopped. It no longer supplies the world with its images, its dreams, its fantasies. No more. It's over. It supplies the world with its nightmares now: the Kennedy assassination, Watergate, Vietnam.
author: J. G. Ballard

quote: To become a great player, you've got to show real dedication and commitment to football, and you've got to be very humble and hard-working. And, above all, you've got to fight to make your dreams come true.
author: Sergio Ramos

quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: I am just a girl chasing her dreams and having an amazing adventure.
author: Madeline Stuart

quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
author: Pindar

quote: We have to stand up for what we believe in, even when we might not be popular for it. Honesty starts with being ourselves, authentic and true to who we are and what we believe in, and that may not always be popular, but it will always let you follow your dreams and your heart.
author: Tabatha Coffey

quote: If you dream of becoming an eagle, you follow your dreams and not the words of a bunch of chickens.
author: Penny Johnson Jerald

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
author: Debby Boone

quote: I have dreams of becoming a professional pastry chef and having a little bakery - that's how much I love baking. I love to cook in general, but my heart lies in desserts.
author: Kim Barnouin

quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Never give up on your dreams, no matter how painful and difficult your journey is.
author: Lisa

quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
author: Ferdinand Porsche

quote: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.
author: Marsha Norman

quote: Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
author: Corin Nemec

quote: Our children are the living messages we send to a future we will ever see... Will we rob them of their destiny? Will we rob them of their dreams? No - we will not do that.
author: Elijah Cummings

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Every scientist dreams of doing something that can help the world.
author: Tu Youyou

quote: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.
author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

quote: Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?
author: Tim Burton

quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
author: Jay Weatherill

quote: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The human heart has hidden treasures, In secret kept, in silence sealed; The thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, Whose charms were broken if revealed.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: I would say don't take advice from people like me who have gotten very lucky. We're very biased. You know, like Taylor Swift telling you to follow your dreams is like a lottery winner telling you, 'Liquidize your assets; buy Powerball tickets - it works!'
author: Bo Burnham

quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
author: Shanice Williams

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.
author: James Lane Allen

quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
author: Jim Carrey

quote: The equal right of all citizens to health, education, work, food, security, culture, science, and wellbeing - that is, the same rights we proclaimed when we began our struggle, in addition to those which emerge from our dreams of justice and equality for all inhabitants of our world - is what I wish for all.
author: Fidel Castro

quote: I feel as though, if you're able to control your dreams, you have more power and control over your mind, like you could reach more areas of your mind. Therefore, I feel like it creates the ability for you to achieve more things in reality.
author: Juice Wrld

quote: I would encourage you to set really high goals. Set goals that, when you set them, you think they're impossible. But then every day you can work towards them, and anything is possible, so keep working hard and follow your dreams.
author: Katie Ledecky

quote: How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads; to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess.
author: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
author: John Updike

quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.
author: Arna Bontemps

quote: Dream small dreams. If you make them too big, you get overwhelmed and you don't do anything. If you make small goals and accomplish them, it gives you the confidence to go on to higher goals.
author: John H. Johnson

quote: All art is exorcism. I paint dreams and visions too; the dreams and visions of my time. Painting is the effort to produce order; order in yourself. There is much chaos in me, much chaos in our time.
author: Otto Dix

quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream. The oak sleeps in the acorn, the bird waits in the egg, and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs. Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
author: James Allen

quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
author: Les Brown

quote: If dreams are like movies, then memories are films about ghosts.
author: Adam Duritz

quote: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: There are many talented people who haven't fulfilled their dreams because they over thought it, or they were too cautious, and were unwilling to make the leap of faith.
author: James Cameron

quote: I always tell young people to hold on to their dreams. And sometimes you have to stand up for what you think is right even if you have to stand alone.
author: Claudette Colvin

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: I never thought in my wildest dreams that I would have my very own school - no way. And I had no idea I'd be coaching girls. It's wild.
author: Liang Chow

quote: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand.
author: Kevin Kwan

quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.
author: Black Elk

quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too.
author: Chris Brown

quote: You see opportunity... Opportunity is like a window: every once in a while, it opens, if you're ready for that opportunity. So be prepared, work hard, and follow your dreams.
author: Nita Strauss

quote: As long as you pray and believe in your dreams, anything is possible.
author: Andy Ruiz Jr.

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Seems like God don't see fit to give the black man nothing but dreams - but He did give us children to make them dreams seem worthwhile.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: Always wear cute pyjamas to bed, you'll never know who u will meet in your dreams.
author: Joel Madden

quote: You can't break my spirit, it's my dreams you take.
author: James Blunt

quote: Everyone loves a comeback story, and everyone loves the underdog as well. I kind of feel like I've been the underdog. Hopefully that inspires people to not give up on themselves and their lives and not give up on their dreams.
author: James Arthur

quote: Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: I want to follow my dreams. I want to make sure that I put myself first and accomplish what I need to accomplish.
author: Lil Tjay

quote: Thankfully, dreams can change. If we'd all stuck with our first dream, the world would be overrun with cowboys and princesses.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: A horse is the projection of peoples' dreams about themselves - strong, powerful, beautiful - and it has the capability of giving us escape from our mundane existence.
author: Pam Brown

quote: I've always been fascinated by memory and dreams because they are both completely our own. No one else has the same memories. No one has the same dreams.
author: Lois Lowry

quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: I feel like dreams are always a little tricky, you know? But if you just push through the struggles and the hard times, it'll be so worth it in the end because you will be able to get to your dreams.
author: Chloe Kim

quote: What is life? A madness. What is life? An illusion, a shadow, a story. And the greatest good is little enough; for all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: There's nothing as exciting as a comeback - seeing someone with dreams, watching them fail, and then getting a second chance.
author: Rachel Griffiths

quote: The motivation is in my heart to work toward my goals and my dreams.
author: Nonito Donaire

quote: I'll see you in my dreams.
author: Gus Kahn

quote: The dialogue between client and architect is about as intimate as any conversation you can have, because when you're talking about building a house, you're talking about dreams.
author: Robert A. M. Stern

quote: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.
author: Emily Bronte

quote: You have to know your identity. It's the biggest thing in wanting to pursue creative dreams.
author: Lauren Daigle

quote: By nature, I'm a very positive person, and because I'm happy in myself, and in my life, and I've got a great husband, and beautiful children, and I have a job that I love that calls for a certain amount of emotional expression, I get to realise a lot of my dreams and aspirations.
author: Kate Winslet

quote: I'm like the luckiest girl in the world. I've gotten to be a princess, I've gotten to work with the Muppets. A lot of my childhood dreams about who I wanted to be when I was a grown-up, I at least get to play them in movies.
author: Amy Adams

quote: Take a leap of faith and begin this wondrous new year by believing. Believe in yourself. And believe that there is a loving Source - a Sower of Dreams - just waiting to be asked to help you make your dreams come true.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow.
author: Paul Watson

quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.
author: LL Cool J

quote: You cannot live to please everyone else. You have to edify, educate and fulfill your own dreams and destiny, and hope that whatever your art is that you're putting out there, if it's received, great, I respect you for receiving it. If it's not received, great, I respect you for not.
author: Octavia Spencer

quote: Happiness is making your dreams come true.
author: Jourdan Dunn

quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: I would like to say every moment counts for you, so make the time that you spend for your dreams a very special moment, make sure that you do something that you'll be happy with when you go back and look at yourself.
author: Jennie

quote: Dreams are, by definition, cursed with short life spans.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: Remember your dreams and fight for them. You must know what you want from life. There is just one thing that makes your dream become impossible: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Believe in yourself, go after your dreams, and don't let anyone put you in a box.
author: Daya

quote: When your dreams include service to others - accomplishing something that contributes to others - it also accelerates the accomplishment of that goal. People want to be part of something that contributes and makes a difference.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: Growing up, my dad was 'get a real job, don't go pursuing your dreams, that's how you become homeless.' So, do I pick my family or do I pick my own happiness, and how much does my own happiness depend on my family?
author: Jimmy O. Yang

quote: Vision gets the dreams started. Dreaming employs your God-given imagination to reinforce the vision. Both are part of something I believe is absolutely necessary to building the life of a champion, a winner, a person of high character who is consistently at the top of whatever game he or she is in.
author: Emmitt Smith

quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
author: Bear Bryant

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If you want to have a life that is worth living, a life that expresses your deepest feelings and emotions and cares and dreams, you have to fight for it.
author: Alice Walker

quote: You have to keep going and pursue your dreams.
author: Joey King

quote: I believe dreams represent the purest form of fantasy we unleash through our subconscious. They represent the truest freedom we can experience. Totally unrepressed and totally creative.
author: Miguel

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: A city is not gauged by its length and width, but by the broadness of its vision and the height of its dreams.
author: Herb Caen

quote: To wear dreams on one's feet is to begin to give a reality to one's dreams.
author: Roger Vivier

quote: I am rich beyond the dreams of avarice.
author: Edward Moore

quote: Even in the hardest circumstances, dreams can give you the courage to live, and I hope I can share that message with children in need.
author: Kim Yuna

quote: I really believe in positive energy and positive thinking and dreams and all that type of stuff.
author: Michael Sorrentino

quote: Dreams do come true if you work hard and you get your head down.
author: Kyla Reid

quote: I am a walking piece of art every day, with my dreams and my ambitions forward at all times in an effort to inspire my fans to lead their life in that way.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: We dream of having a clean house - but who dreams of actually doing the cleaning? We don't have to dream about doing the work, because doing the work is always within our grasp; the dream, in this sense, is to attain the goal without the work.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: I've accomplished a lot, but I still have more dreams that I want to achieve.
author: Joe Jonas

quote: Private dreams are the most powerful. You have to dream of success to make it happen, and if you don't believe in yourself, nobody else will. But that doesn't mean you have to go around telling everyone about it.
author: Tony McCoy

quote: In dreams, anything can be anything, and everybody can do. We can fly, we can turn upside down, we can transform into anything.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: To become truly immortal, a work of art must escape all human limits: logic and common sense will only interfere. But once these barriers are broken, it will enter the realms of childhood visions and dreams.
author: Giorgio de Chirico

quote: Talking about dreams is like talking about movies, since the cinema uses the language of dreams; years can pass in a second, and you can hop from one place to another. It's a language made of image. And in the real cinema, every object and every light means something, as in a dream.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: It's just the risk that I take and the sacrifice that I make: Putting myself, my career, my family's peace of mind on the line just to do right by my fans. It ain't no gray area: You're either with that and willing to go out of your way to make people who contribute to your dreams coming true happy or you aren't.
author: DaBaby

quote: I have a long way to go as far as my acting career is concerned. Lots of milestones are to be achieved and dreams to be fulfilled. I would someday want to do playback singing, too, as I am a very passionate singer.
author: Roop Durgapal

quote: It doesn't matter how you look. As long as you train hard, you focus and you're hungry, and that drive is in you to follow your dreams, everything is possible.
author: Andy Ruiz Jr.

quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: I want everyone to know that they can accomplish anything they want at any age if they just be themselves. I want to encourage millions to chase their dreams and to never change. Everyone should also know how to throw a good right hook!
author: Paige

quote: Short stories are tiny windows into other worlds and other minds and dreams. They are journeys you can make to the far side of the universe and still be back in time for dinner.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.
author: Tecumseh

quote: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: A lot of people have their big dreams and get knocked down and don't have things go their way. And you never give up hope, and you really just hold on to it. Hard work and perserverance. You just keep getting up and getting up, and then you get that breakthrough.
author: Robert Kraft

quote: I am the underdog, and I want to prove that one can follow one's dreams despite all the flaws and setbacks.
author: Winnie Harlow

quote: Mr. Tennyson has said that more things are wrought by prayer than this world dreams of, but he wisely refrains from saying whether they are good or bad things.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: I stayed true to my dreams and, eventually, they came true.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: I've always followed my heart and pursued my dreams, and I imagine that people find that inspiring. I hope that is the effect I have on my fans and people in general. I definitely want to project a positive energy out into the world.
author: Britney Spears

quote: Believe in love. Believe in magic. Hell, believe in Santa Clause. Believe in others. Believe in yourself. Believe in your dreams. If you don't, who will?
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: You reach for the stars and you work your butt off to achieve your dreams. If you fall short, you fall short, but you say you gave it your best.
author: Frank Vogel

quote: Arthur Russell is very important to me on many levels, and when I read Tim Lawrence's biography on him, 'Hold on to Your Dreams,' one of the things I took away was: first thought, best thought. I live by that when I make my own music.
author: Arca

quote: Believe in yourself and believe in your dreams. Follow them, never give up, that's the most important thing. If you believe you can get there, then one day you will.
author: Joao Moutinho

quote: I want to show everyone that if you pursue your dreams, they can come true no matter what. That's what I want to do.
author: Martin Garrix

quote: It's a really scary thing, having your dreams come true and seeing everything you ever wanted happening, getting the attention for it and then not knowing how to handle it properly.
author: Samaire Armstrong

quote: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams.
author: Alain Wertheimer

quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: Talking, talking. Spinning a web of words, pale walls of dreams, between myself and all I see.
author: John Gardner

quote: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.
author: Candace Parker

quote: You have many years ahead of you to create the dreams that we can't even imagine dreaming. You have done more for the collective unconscious of this planet than you will ever know.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: When you follow your dreams, you encourage other people to follow theirs.
author: Nafessa Williams

quote: People think that dreams are better than reality but this is not always the case; sometimes, because you dream too much, you are unable to see what you have in front of your very eyes.
author: Antonio Munoz Molina

quote: A man is a god in ruins. When men are innocent, life shall be longer, and shall pass into the immortal, as gently as we awake from dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Computers are magnificent tools for the realization of our dreams, but no machine can replace the human spark of spirit, compassion, love, and understanding.
author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quote: Pursue your dreams but have a backup plan.
author: Kane

quote: Aren't we all dreamers? It's only because man dreamt of flying that we are travelling in planes. Behind all inventions, we see the dreams of people.
author: Ajith Kumar

quote: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.
author: Chris Kyle

quote: Dreams are real as long as they last. Can we say more of life?
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Keep God first, chase your dreams, and everything will pay off.
author: Jacob Latimore

quote: Society sets us up to be everything but ourselves, but I want to take a moment and say to people, love yourself. Find your purpose. You are unique, and that makes you great. I pursued my dreams. You can do it, too.
author: Karen Civil

quote: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.
author: Spike Lee

quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.
author: Katori Hall

quote: I hope my story inspires everyone out there to keep hustling and chasing their dreams.
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
author: Man Ray

quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.
author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark

quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Life is short. You've got to live your dreams.
author: Tiffany Darwish

quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: There is one thing that gets you out of bed in the morning, and that is discipline. Because your dreams and your goals are not there waking up for you in the morning.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Wide awake I can make my most fantastic dreams come true.
author: Lorenz Hart

quote: The way to kill a man or a nation is to cut off his dreams, the way the whites are taking care of the Indians: killing their dreams, their magic, their familiar spirits.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: No matter where you are from, no matter what your background is, no matter what your socioeconomic status is, every person can achieve his or her dreams.
author: Ileana Ros-Lehtinen

quote: I believe in everything until it's disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now?
author: John Lennon

quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: The world is full of people who have dreams of playing at Carnegie Hall, of running a marathon, and of owning their own business. The difference between the people who make it across the finish line and everyone else is one simple thing: an action plan.
author: John Tesh

quote: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: There will be many obstacles in the pursuit of your dreams. I had long hours of training, balancing studies and badminton.
author: P. V. Sindhu

quote: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.
author: Peter Arno

quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: We must stop talking about the American dream and start listening to the dreams of Americans.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: My imagination completely controls me, and forever feeds the fire that burns with dark red light in my heart by bringing me the best dreams. I've always had a wild imagination, a big heart and a tortured soul so I feel that dark fantasy, love and horror are in my blood.
author: Kim Elizabeth

quote: If there is one place on the face of earth where all the dreams of living men have found a home from the very earliest days when man began the dream of existence, it is India.
author: Romain Rolland

quote: There is a reason they called it chasing your dreams and not walking after them.
author: Shannon Sharpe

quote: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
author: James A. Michener

quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen.
author: Anthony Hamilton

quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
author: John Wooden

quote: Folk songs express the dreams and prayers and hopes of the working people.
author: Hank Williams

quote: I had no dreams of such economic success. You should have fun and not be so weighed down by expectations.
author: Sergey Brin

quote: Make treating yourself a priority and always remember your life is happening now. Don't put off all your dreams and pleasures to another day. In any balanced personal definition of success there has to be a powerful element of living life in the present.
author: Mireille Guiliano

quote: I just wish people would realize that anything's possible if you try; dreams are made possible if you try.
author: Terry Fox

quote: I'm just a normal girl who dreams, who fights for what I believe.
author: Leila Lopes

quote: Everyone has golden years sparsely throughout their life, but good things happen and then good things disappear. But you'll always have those good times, and when you're on your deathbed you'll be able to look back on those times when you were with the girl of your dreams.
author: Daniel Caesar

quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.
author: Kristanna Loken

quote: I think it is often easier to make progress on mega-ambitious dreams. Since no one else is crazy enough to do it, you have little competition. In fact, there are so few people this crazy that I feel like I know them all by first name.
author: Larry Page

quote: All I can say is that it's important to follow your dreams.
author: Hunx

quote: Just follow your dreams and be patient.
author: Angelique Kerber

quote: My dreams for the future are simple: work, a happy, healthy family, a lovely long motorcycle ride, and continuing the struggle to awaken people to the need for serious human rights reform.
author: Mike Farrell

quote: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life.
author: Kumail Nanjiani

quote: In dreams begins responsibility.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: Like my mother, I was always saying, 'I'll fix my life one day.' It became clear when I saw her die without fulfilling her dreams that my time was now or maybe never.
author: Liz Murray

quote: You can do anything if you set your mind to it. Look out for kids, help them dream and be inspired. We teach calculus in schools, but I believe the most important formula is courage plus dreams equals success.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations; reality is therefore abandoned.
author: Emile Durkheim

quote: At the end of the day, I think people just need to start listening to their hearts and their gut feelings and their dreams, because that's what I did.
author: Saroo Brierley

quote: I think dreams can come true, but not necessarily like fairy-tales. It's not always so perfect like that.
author: Patrick Dempsey

quote: Women are not in love with me but with the picture of me on the screen. I am merely the canvas on which women paint their dreams.
author: Rudolph Valentino

quote: I haven't had an easy life, but at some point, you have to take responsibility for yourself and shape who it is that you want to be. I have no time for moaners. I like to chase my dreams and surround myself with other people who are chasing their dreams, too.
author: Aimee Mullins

quote: We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.
author: Judy Garland

quote: I always feel like it's two key ingredients when it comes to following your dreams, making something happen that the average person deems difficult. If you truly believe it, that's step one. Step two, is, you know, the hard work that goes along with it.
author: J. Cole

quote: There are a lot of people who have dreams, goals, and hopes, but there aren't a lot who get to see them realized.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: I'm a big fan of dreams. Unfortunately, dreams are our first casualty in life - people seem to give them up, quicker than anything, for a 'reality.'
author: Kevin Costner

quote: Our brains have this habit of quilting dreams from the fabrics of our lives. As a filmmaker, I get to do it for a living.
author: Peter Landesman

quote: There is no substitute under the heavens for productive labor. It is the process by which dreams become realities. It is the process by which idle visions become dynamic achievements.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Death is the mother of Beauty; hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: I would certainly encourage young people to pursue their dreams. It isn't always an easy path, but it's worth going after. And I figure if a farmer's daughter from Iowa can become an astronaut, you can be just about anything you want to be.
author: Peggy Whitson

quote: I was always scared to follow my dreams because if I follow my dreams and I fail, I can't dream about it anymore. It's easier to settle for less.
author: Cardi B

quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.
author: Henry Norris Russell

quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.
author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quote: I don't like to talk about my dreams. I like to make them happen. I prefer to talk about them when they're done.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: I am against nature. I don't dig nature at all. I think nature is very unnatural. I think the truly natural things are dreams, which nature can't touch with decay.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: I hear from all different people, not just people like me, or lesbians. It be straight people, it be grown men, it be grown women, people that have been sick or depressed that say, 'Oh, you made me want to go do what I want to do for myself and chase my dreams.' That's my purpose.
author: Young M.A

quote: In my dreams, I could be a Princess, and that's what I was. Like most little girls, I believed nothing less than a Prince could make my dreams come true.
author: Loretta Young

quote: He's dreaming with his eyes open, and those that dream with their eyes open are dangerous, for they do not know when their dreams come to an end.
author: Hugo Pratt

quote: I tell kids to pursue their basketball dreams, but I tell them to not let that be their only dream.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: We didn't know how to run a business, but we had dreams and talent.
author: Ruth Handler

quote: I always knew that we were going to be successful and accomplish and succeed at our dreams. There was never a doubt in my mind. When we were recording 'Appetite For Destruction', we all knew.
author: Steven Adler

quote: You have to work hard for what you want to achieve and you have to set goals and dreams and really go for them.
author: Natalie du Toit

quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: The follow your dreams thing is really important because so many people are railroaded into taking other paths by their family, their friends, people who should be supportive going, 'What are you talking about?' Even just seemingly regular career paths, but if it's not what people expect for you they kind of react funny.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I believe to have shown that, at times, the impossible can become possible. It all depends on how much each and every one of us believes in our dreams, in our strength, and in our determination.
author: Roberto Baggio

quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: I'm a true believer in the strength of teamwork, in the power of dreams.
author: Julie Payette

quote: No one may speak for the dead, no one may interpret their mutilated dreams and visions.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I was in school to play basketball; I wasn't trying to be a doctor. It's hard to talk about the NCAA rules and everything that happened in the past because I've just been focused on practicing and getting ready... I was trying to reach my dreams, and that's to play in the NBA.
author: Ben Simmons

quote: The percentage you're paying is too high priced While you're living beyond all your means And the man in the suit has just bought a new car From the profit he's made on your dreams.
author: Steve Winwood

quote: For all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Don't let the winds blow your dreams away... or steal your faith in God.
author: Vin Scully

quote: Without peace, all other dreams vanish and are reduced to ashes.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: The difference between a builder and an architect is that an architect also cares about desire, about dreams.
author: Renzo Piano

quote: I don't remember my dreams too much. I hardly have ever gotten ideas from nighttime dreams. But I love daydreaming and dream logic and the way dreams go.
author: David Lynch

quote: The truth is, successful people are not ten times smarter than you. They don't really work ten times harder than you. So why are they successful? Because their dreams are so much bigger than yours!
author: Dan Pena

quote: To all the kids out there: Follow your dream. Believe in your dream. Because dreams do come true.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: Of all our dreams today there is none more important - or so hard to realise - than that of peace in the world. May we never lose our faith in it or our resolve to do everything that can be done to convert it one day into reality.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: There is no better gift a society can give children than the opportunity to grow up safe and free - the chance to pursue whatever dreams they may have.
author: John Roberts

quote: I have this little plaque that my husband hung on our wall at home. It says, 'If your dreams don't scare you, they're not big enough.'
author: Julie Sweet

quote: I don't think the dreams die - I think that people give up. I think it gets too hard.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: We are not saving lives. We are selling dreams.
author: Marco Bizzarri

quote: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: In my head, at least, the business of spinning stories has no closing time. Twists in my characters' lives, glimpses of their secrets, obstacles to their dreams... all arrive unbidden when I'm getting cash at the ATM, walking my son to camp, singing a hymn at a wedding.
author: Julia Glass

quote: My mother gave me my drive but my father gave me my dreams.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: It was no accident that I made 'Hoop Dreams' because it concerned a sport that I loved and hoped would be my dream, however far-fetched that turned out to be. Because of the success of that film, Hollywood pigeonholed me as a sports biopic guy, which led to 'Prefontaine' and two cable sports films.
author: Steve James

quote: A successful life is one that is lived through understanding and pursuing one's own path, not chasing after the dreams of others.
author: Chin-Ning Chu

quote: It's hard because people always say, 'Follow your dreams,' but it's not a perfect world, and things don't always work out. But you've just got to work hard, and you can't take things for granted.
author: Stephen Colletti

quote: Mothers have always held such symbolic weight in determining a person's worth. Your mother tongue, your motherland, your mother's values - these things can qualify or disqualify you from attaining myriad American dreams: love, fluency, citizenship, legitimacy, acceptance, success, freedom.
author: Jenny Zhang

quote: Anyone who has lost track of time when using a computer knows the propensity to dream, the urge to make dreams come true and the tendency to miss lunch.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Follow your heart, and don't be subservient to anyone. Shut out the world, and only listen to your heart to fulfill your dreams.
author: Dutee Chand

quote: I hope I inspire people who hear. Hearing people have the ability to remove barriers that prevent deaf people from achieving their dreams.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Not all lucid dreams are useful but they all have a sense of wonder about them. If you must sleep through a third of your life, why should you sleep through your dreams, too?
author: Stephen LaBerge

quote: In the fifties I had dreams about touching a naked woman and she would turn to bronze or the dream about hot dogs chasing donuts through the Lincoln Tunnel.
author: Robert Klein

quote: Believe it or not, lots of people change their majors and abandon their dreams just to avoid a couple of math classes in college.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: I am quite a dreamer. I think we all are dreamers. We all don't like to live a practical life all the time. There is a thin line between our hopes and dreams.
author: Rani Mukerji

quote: Ours is the job of interpreting the Constitution. And that document isn't some inkblot on which litigants may project their hopes and dreams.
author: Neil Gorsuch

quote: Having achieved my own dreams, I want to give to kids who are less fortunate, who struggle with everyday obstacles. I want to give them something positive in their lives: support.
author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quote: Jazz to me is a living music. It's a music that since its beginning has expressed the feelings, the dreams, hopes, of the people.
author: Dexter Gordon

quote: Dream the impossible because dreams do come true.
author: Elijah Wood

quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: I know it's cliche to say, 'When you do something you love you never work a day in your life.' But it is true: When you do something you love, life gets to be a little bit easier and enjoyable. So I just want people to follow their dreams.
author: Tika Sumpter

quote: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'
author: Karl Malone

quote: Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: Our dreams are a second life. I have never been able to penetrate without a shudder those ivory or horned gates which separate us from the invisible world.
author: Gerard De Nerval

quote: There are women succeeding beyond their wildest dreams because of their sobriety.
author: Mary Karr

quote: All books are either dreams or swords, you can cut, or you can drug, with words.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Never think you can't do something. I definitely never thought I could write a book, and even after I started writing it, I was like, 'Oh my God, how am I gonna write a book?' Just set your sights high and reach for the stars. Go live your dreams, and never think you can't.
author: Connor Franta

quote: You can't take anything personally in this business. Follow your dreams, but there is a lot of criticism. You have to brush it off. Everybody is looking for something different.
author: Kendall Jenner

quote: We are built to be happy, strong and healthy. I fear not to live. We have everything to live up to our dreams. You have everything to achieve that, and in a very short period of time you can get all the tools to manifest who you want to be.
author: Wim Hof

quote: I know it can be difficult to try and achieve your dreams when you don't have the same advantages as some other people may have, but this is a country full of opportunity where amazing things can happen, if you are willing to hustle and be smart about it.
author: Kat Timpf

quote: I think the biggest advice that I could give people is to actually try and live beyond your dreams by pushing yourself, challenging yourself to do things a little bit outside of your comfort zone.
author: Peggy Whitson

quote: A God Jar is anything you wish it to be, in which you can put your wishes, dreams, problems, prayers. You may want to think of it as a spiritual mailbox.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: But we can hold our spirits and our bodies so pure and high, we may cherish such thoughts and such ideals, and dream such dreams of lofty purpose, that we can determine and know what manner of men we will be, whenever and wherever the hour strikes and calls to noble action.
author: Joshua Chamberlain

quote: A lot of dreams can turn to nightmares... if you don't really work them.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: A test of what is real is that it is hard and rough. Joys are found in it, not pleasure. What is pleasant belongs to dreams.
author: Simone Weil

quote: The inner confidence in knowing who you are, believing in your dreams, and following your heart, is what make you radiate from within.
author: Heart Evangelista

quote: With my charity Big Dreams For Kids, I believe the more you give, the more you receive.
author: Flo Rida

quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: I've always been a champion of kids pursuing their dreams. But sometimes in life, extraordinary circumstances may force us to temporarily put our dreams on hold. The most important thing is to never lose sight of that dream, no matter what punches life may throw in our way.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: Swimming is a life-saving skill, so just the fact that the sport that I love can give so much back to other people - and inspire them to join something that they never thought they could do or go after their dreams - is something that is really special to me.
author: Simone Manuel

quote: I have a notebook that is filled to the brim with my dreams and ideas and goals and aspirations.
author: Karlie Kloss

quote: America allows us to be able to dream, then gives us the ability to achieve those dreams.
author: Rick Mears

quote: I'm anything but a small-town girl. I have big, big dreams, and I plan on making them happen.
author: Farrah Abraham

quote: Memories have huge staying power, but like dreams, they thrive in the dark, surviving for decades in the deep waters of our minds like shipwrecks on the sea bed.
author: J. G. Ballard

quote: So let me get this straight: Kaepernick sacrificed his career, dreams, and reputation fighting for social justice because he was shown he couldn't do both - be an activist and be in the league. But in the end, the players coalition allegedly agrees to a deal with a price tag, and Colin's left out of it. Tell me that doesn't feel a little dirty.
author: Molly Qerim

quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: I think the fact that I am living my dream and being really productive and embarking on all my lifelong aspirations is proof enough that if I can do it, anyone can. I try to tell everybody to dream big and go after their dreams.
author: Elliott Yamin

quote: Women have to summon up courage to fulfill dormant dreams.
author: Alice Walker

quote: To pursue your dreams, to have them come true, to have made a difference, to have changed society, to have fought against powerful forces... that's a life well-spent.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: To be a human being is to be in a state of tension between your appetites and your dreams, and the social realities around you and your obligations to your fellow man.
author: John Updike

quote: People with disabilities have abilities too and that is what this course is all about - making sure those abilities blossom and shine so that all the dreams you have can come true.
author: Mary McAleese

quote: Men don't come up to you to just talk. We come up to you with a plan. We're looking across the room at you, and we don't care about your hopes and dreams. We don't care about what your future holds. We saw something we wanted.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Our dreams are made of real things, like a shoebox full of photographs.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: Hollywood is the dream factory, and no one dreams about older women.
author: Amy Heckerling

quote: There are so many dreams that I'd like to follow.
author: AB de Villiers

quote: I don't like dreams or reality. I like when dreams become reality because that is my life.
author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: I had dreams of conehead aliens when I was little. Before 'Saturday Night Live' did it. And then they came out with them, and I went on to be a glorified extra in the movie. When everyone else was laughing, I was scared.
author: Parker Posey

quote: My father is a very successful man in the corporate world, and I am his only son. He had certain dreams for me. I was scared to tell him that I wanted to be an actor.
author: Ram Kapoor

quote: I envy people with dreams and passions, but I don't think that way. I still don't have a 'bliss' to follow. For people like me - I suspect that's most people - holding out for a 'dream' or a 'passion' is paralyzing. I just like having work I enjoy that feels meaningful. That's hard enough... but it's enough.
author: Jane Pauley

quote: I adore this adventure, I adore working with youth. For me it's a daily challenge, working to help these youths realize their dreams.
author: Patrick Roy

quote: Nothing is worse than having your dreams come true.
author: Robert Lepage

quote: Ever since I was a kid, I wanted to be a marine biologist. As you go through the grind and the distraction of a career, it's easy to lose sight of your dreams.
author: Paul Walker

quote: We should be dreaming. We grew up as kids having dreams, but now we're too sophisticated as adults, as a nation. We stopped dreaming. We should always have dreams.
author: Herb Brooks

quote: If a small-town boy like me who bagged groceries was able to make his dreams come true, you can too.
author: Bad Bunny

quote: If you don't have dreams, you don't have a life.
author: Bryce Harper

quote: A true architect is not an artist but an optimistic realist. They take a diverse number of stakeholders, extract needs, concerns, and dreams, then create a beautiful yet tangible solution that is loved by the users and the community at large. We create vessels in which life happens.
author: Cameron Sinclair

quote: The starting point of discovering who you are, your gifts, your talents, your dreams, is being comfortable with yourself. Spend time alone. Write in a journal. Take long walks in the woods.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: I don't think you should spend your life praying for things, but I do believe you should thank God for what He's given you... but I think the scripture teaches us that we can pray for our dreams, pray for the big things... he's not a small God; this God is incredible.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I've got big, big dreams for the future.
author: Margot Robbie

quote: Integrity is critical to our lives - and to our dreams of achievement. We must remember that without integrity, nothing else matters and that with integrity, nothing else matters.
author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quote: A man becomes what he dreams. And I dreamed of being in the movies. I was brought up on Steve McQueen, Clint Eastwood, Warren Beatty, and Cary Grant.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I never wished to be a 'rock star.' I just wanted to be a working musician. My dreams didn't even go past a session player or a working musician. It was too far beyond my dreams.
author: John 5

quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.
author: Angie Stone

quote: Even in the wildest of my dreams, I didn't expect this love and affection as an actor.
author: Nani

quote: I'm not just a boy toy. I have feelings and dreams like anybody else.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: For me, the sketching of dresses was about fantasy and dreams. In my little room at home, I felt that I was somewhere else. In Paris, for instance.
author: Alber Elbaz

quote: Only in dreams, in poetry, in play do we sometimes arrive at what we were before we were this thing that, who knows, we are.
author: Julio Cortazar

quote: I had to overcome challenge after challenge in order to take my life from nothing to living my dreams.
author: Curtis Jackson

quote: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
author: Gail Godwin

quote: Dreams are illusions, and we can't let go of them because we would be dead.
author: David Copperfield

quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: In my dreams and visions, I seemed to see a line, and on the other side of that line were green fields, and lovely flowers, and beautiful white ladies, who stretched out their arms to me over the line, but I couldn't reach them no-how. I always fell before I got to the line.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: Field of Dreams is probably our generation's It's A Wonderful Life.
author: Kevin Costner

quote: You need to have dreams, you need to go for it, otherwise why would you be a footballer?
author: Virgil van Dijk

quote: If there are dreams about a beautiful South Africa, there are also roads that lead to their goal. Two of these roads could be named Goodness and Forgiveness.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I prefer to be a dreamer among the humblest, with visions to be realized, than lord among those without dreams and desires.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: People ask how can a Jewish kid from the Bronx do preppy clothes? Does it have to do with class and money? It has to do with dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: Right now, I have some big dreams. But at the same time, if I get annoyed and harassed by the media, I'll just quit. I don't care. We're set for life. I have quite a temper.
author: Anna Benson

quote: To every people the land is given on condition. Perceived or not, there is a Covenant, beyond the constitution, beyond sovereign guarantee, beyond the nation's sweetest dreams of itself.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Buying an apartment in New York was beyond my wildest dreams. I had to scrape together every cent to buy it. And I'm so happy I did.
author: John Searles

quote: Those born into poverty or on the margins of society require our extra support to realize their dreams.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: New Year's Day. A fresh start. A new chapter in life waiting to be written. New questions to be asked, embraced, and loved. Answers to be discovered and then lived in this transformative year of delight and self-discovery. Today carve out a quiet interlude for yourself in which to dream, pen in hand. Only dreams give birth to change.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: It's actually one of my dreams to have my own album. My music genre is dark pop.
author: Catriona Gray

quote: Beware of advice about successful people and their methods. For starters, no two situations are alike. Your dreams of creating a dry-cleaning empire won't be helped by knowing that Thomas Edison liked to take naps.
author: Scott Adams

quote: My dreams are bigger than money; they're bigger than fame.
author: Kenny Omega

quote: The only time you really live fully is from thirty to sixty. The young are slaves to dreams; the old servants of regrets. Only the middle-aged have all their five senses in the keeping of their wits.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In high school, I worked eight hours a day just so I could get into the college of my dreams and say that I got in - and I never went.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: As you get older, you have to force yourself to have new dreams. For instance, I've been flying for 37 years, but now teaching others to fly is interesting for me. Sometimes you have to find new angles on life to keep you interested, like sharing successes and inspiring and helping others.
author: John Travolta

quote: Today, I'm very happy about myself, because I realized my dreams. I learned how to understand what people want.
author: Roberto Cavalli

quote: I just keep getting inspired to believe that dreams come true and anything can happen, 'cause I've watched so many impossible things happen.
author: Machine Gun Kelly

quote: One of my dreams was being called a 'Diaper Dandy' by Dick Vitale. He calls me that all the time now. It's surreal.
author: Trae Young

quote: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.
author: Gilda Radner

quote: Then I was working in a store in Newark, New Jersey, and I saw an actor in person, and I got so excited. My whole day changed. That's when I decided to challenge myself to make my dreams become a reality.
author: Derek Luke

quote: We must not let our passions destroy our dreams.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Old age realizes the dreams of youth: look at Dean Swift; in his youth he built an asylum for the insane, in his old age he was himself an inmate.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Never let your dreams go away.
author: Mike Piazza

quote: Most of us accept that although we may believe our dreams to be real events, upon waking, we can tell the difference between nocturnal hallucinations and reality.
author: Siri Hustvedt

quote: When I was either 7 or 8 years old, I did a sketch every day of my teacher and what she wore. At the end of the year, I gave her the sketchbook. For me, the sketching of dresses was about fantasy and dreams.
author: Alber Elbaz

quote: As you look back at your life, there are just a million different things that have happened, just in the right way, to allow you to make your dreams come true. And you know, someone has all that under control.
author: Michael P. Anderson

quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Sexual dreams aren't usually about sex.
author: Pamela Stephenson
