quote: I don't stand in anybody else's way of accomplishing their dreams, and I don't like people standing in my way, either. That seems like a hostile thing to do.
author: Jamey Johnson

quote: A safe life includes following your dreams with the full knowledge that doing so is not, in any way, shape or form, safe in the traditional meaning of the word. Because living safely means dying without too many regrets. That is safe.
author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quote: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for.
author: McKayla Maroney

quote: I don't understand people who dream in black and white. I just don't get it. My dreams have always been vivid color.
author: Gary Ross

quote: I never, in my wildest dreams, could I have thought that the first role I get out of school would lead to an Oscar nomination.
author: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: Real shapes and real patterns are things you would observe in nature, like the marks on the back of a cobra's hood or the markings on a fish or a lizard. Imaginary shapes are just that, symbols that come to a person in dreams or reveries and are charged with meaning.
author: Jim Woodring

quote: I was born in Paris in the mid-1960s, and by the time I was 12 I had started going to the movies by myself. Most of the movies of that period never appealed to me. I didn't like the 'naturalism,' the sad or the 'down-to-earth' characters. What I wanted from film was fantasy, dreams, funny situations, extravagant decor - and beautiful women.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: We can bring to characters dark and bright sides that nobody even dreams about.
author: Sonia Braga

quote: I'm sure Roddenberry in his wildest dreams never would have thought he would have gotten five TV series out of his idea.
author: John de Lancie

quote: Dreams really tell you about yourself more than anything else in this world could ever tell you.
author: Sylvia Browne

quote: I think there must be a place inside of us where dreams go and wait their turn.
author: Sue Monk Kidd

quote: I'd definitely be the kind of parent who enabled my child's dreams. I'd just watch and nurture and guide them. I have the blueprints of what not to do... I think I'd be a good parent, actually.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: My goal is to live out my dreams, to have a long NBA career, win championships and provide for them. My mom works two jobs. She does security and event staffing. My sister is a waitress. Anytime I'm down or don't want to work out, I remember our situation and what I've got to keep doing.
author: Quinn Cook

quote: Dreams only happen if you go out to get them.
author: Maddie Marlow

quote: I never - in my dreams, doing track in high school, I didn't imagine it would turn out like this.
author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce

quote: When people ask me where I get my ideas, I lie. I tell them I draw inspiration from the news, the world, my dreams. Or I joke and say that I steal from other writers. I lie because I don't know where ideas come from, and I'm afraid if I look too hard, they'll stop coming.
author: Marcus Sakey

quote: I had dreams of catching the ball for the final out in the World Series and being mobbed by my teammates. Well, I guess all my dreams didn't come true.
author: Robin Yount

quote: Education is the social bedrock for the hopes and dreams of our children and the foundation that is necessary for their future prosperity.
author: John Hickenlooper

quote: 'The Disaster Artist' isn't really about 'The Room.' It's about friendship and how dreams can come true.
author: Greg Sestero

quote: For me they are no different, reality and dreams.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: I must refine my training every day to give myself the best opportunity to achieve my dreams during the Olympic Games in Rio.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: Every book in the 'Dreams' cycle dramatizes a particular epoch in the ongoing cultural collision between North America's native peoples and its European colonizers.
author: Tom Bissell

quote: 'Titanic' made me want to tell stories... To have all these characters and costumes and have ambition and think big and have dreams... It came at a very troubled period of my life.
author: Xavier Dolan

quote: I have goals and aspirations, and I believe that you can go after your dreams, and it can work if you have someone there that's supporting you.
author: Tia Mowry

quote: To me, being an All Black means following our dreams.
author: Beauden Barrett

quote: Whenever I start a 'Potter' film, I get these dreams. The last dream I had, I was in a war and the sky was blotted with broomsticks and I couldn't find my wand. It was so intense. I always have mental, intense, war wizard dreams when I'm doing the films.
author: Natalia Tena

quote: I don't dissuade people from formal education. What I encourage them to do is to follow their dreams.
author: Ritesh Agarwal

quote: I was working at the store on the Sony studios in Culver City. And I was literally holding a shirt when they came in and told me I'd got the part! It just shows dreams do come true.
author: Derek Luke

quote: I tell kids to have dreams, have goals, and believe in them because if you have any doubt, worry or fear, it will choke the life out of your dreams and goals.
author: Torii Hunter

quote: I'm fulfilling my dreams that I had as a kid every single day. That's why I'm trying to enjoy it so much.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: I think there's this standard in our society that when we become a mother, we just become a mother, and that's all you are. That's an amazing thing, but I think you're doing your child a disservice by not following your dreams either. I work really hard to make sure that I'm chasing all the things I always dreamed of.
author: Lights

quote: One of my goals and dreams is to work in film in the future.
author: Zac Posen

quote: Obama is a very fine writer with an excellent command of language. His memoir 'Dreams From My Father' is a fine book, but it will not rank as one of the great autobiographies.
author: Fred Kaplan

quote: We all get lost along the way, but hopefully we figure out some sort of path. It helps if you can imagine the process as well as the goal. Those kinds of dreams are easier to achieve.
author: Annette Bening

quote: I had dreamt of playing for Arsenal and Real Madrid, and those dreams came true. Maybe I can dream of winning the Ballon d'Or, and that can come true as well.
author: Emmanuel Adebayor

quote: It's what every kid dreams of: winning a World Cup for your country. There's nothing that will ever, ever beat that or even compare to it.
author: Fran Kirby

quote: Ralph Lauren is about creating stories, creating concepts that consumers want to live in. We are about creating dreams.
author: David Lauren

quote: I think basically becoming famous has taken the place of going to Heaven in modern society, hasn't it? That's the place where your dreams will come true. It's an act of faith now; they think that's going to sort things out.
author: Jarvis Cocker

quote: I had 11 or 12 years in Barcelona, my family is there and also many friends. The fans loved me, I felt highly valued throughout the club and it is always hard to leave the club of your dreams.
author: Pedro

quote: United Nations Day marks the birthday of our founding Charter - the landmark document that embodies the hopes, dreams and aspirations of 'we the peoples.'
author: Antonio Guterres

quote: I think we all need to believe in hope: that if we have dreams and if we have ambitions and if we have skills and talents - that if you really put your heart into something and you work at it hard enough - that you can make your dreams come true.
author: David Furnish

quote: I wasn't bullied or anything, but I was treated differently because I was an actor, and I had big dreams.
author: Kodi Smit-McPhee

quote: Sci-fi is speculative fiction. 'Field of Dreams' is sci-fi.
author: Bonnie Hammer

quote: So much of Sue Sylvester, the angry woman, came from that part of my life, wanting to crush other people's dreams and judging others so harshly, which is always just a way of deflecting your own self-judgment.
author: Jane Lynch

quote: The Brown decision promised that every child, regardless of the color of his or her skin, would have unequivocal access to quality education and an equal opportunity to pursue his/her dreams.
author: Ed Markey

quote: The success I have achieved in bodybuilding, motion pictures, and business would not have been possible without the generosity of the American people and the freedom here to pursue your dreams.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I didn't move to Nashville with any inkling or dreams of getting a record deal. I didn't have those stars in my eyes. I just wanted to take a break, relax, and figure out songwriting.
author: Maren Morris

quote: I've got a lot of dreams I want to achieve, and I hope someone can cheer me on as I'll cheer them on in their dreams.
author: Hunter Hayes

quote: My killer crossover project would be to combine Bjork and Grace Jones with the West Coast rappers and create this massive music. That's, like, one of my dreams.
author: Jason Moran

quote: We're special because dreams that are impossible anywhere else, come true here. That's not just my story. That's your story. That's our story.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: I'm following my dreams and doing what I love as a designer. I did not want to be one of those kids with a famous last name that doesn't do anything. That is very unfulfilling to me and I'm very happy.
author: Nicky Hilton

quote: Good jobs that allow Coloradans to pursue their dreams and provide for their families are vital to a prosperous country and empower each person.
author: Ryan Frazier

quote: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: My wildest dreams and the goals that I set for myself, I never imagined the success that I've been blessed with, and believe me, I feel blessed.
author: The Undertaker

quote: The truth is, even those who think Dreams only happen to someone else carry a Dream hidden deep in their heart, just hoping it can come true.
author: Bruce Wilkinson

quote: I've made mistakes before of doing different projects just based on my dreams, my hopes, my thing, and not really thinking about my customers.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: I have dreams, and I want to see them come to fruition.
author: Abby Lee Miller

quote: After more than a decade as the editor of 'Wired' magazine, Chris Anderson started the company of his dreams - a robotics manufacturing company called 3D Robotics - to produce the autonomous flying vehicles coming out of DIY Drones.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: I think when you're in a relationship where you really care for the other person, when they achieve their dreams it's better than when you do yourself.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: Most of my actor friends don't believe it's possible to let go of it and be happy, and for a while that was true for me. For the first two years I ached, every day. And I had such bad dreams. But then I made the decision to start working on my little shop and all that went away.
author: Genie Francis

quote: My theory is that literature is essential to society in the way that dreams are essential to our lives. We can't live without dreaming - as we can't live without sleep. We are 'conscious' beings for only a limited period of time, then we sink back into sleep - the 'unconscious.' It is nourishing, in ways we can't fully understand.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: It is exactly because we are a city that embraces freedom, that welcomes everyone and encourages their dreams, that New York remains on the front lines in the war on terror.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: To have played for England was my ultimate ambition, and to do so at four World Cups and represent Team GB at a home Olympics was beyond the wildest dreams I had when first starting out.
author: Karen Carney

quote: I like to keep the median age in my lab low because they will indulge me in my dreams. They don't yet think things are impossible.
author: George M. Church

quote: As I've grown - dare I say it - older, I had hopes of indulging my dreams of being a sailor.
author: Jimmy Webb

quote: Field of Dreams is the only movie - and I saw it in the theater - on an afternoon when I was on location somewhere, and there were like 12 people in the theater. I was just so devastated; I couldn't get out of my seat. And I sat and watched it a second time.
author: Paul Reiser

quote: Both of my parents were both multi-sport athletes. Their mindset was, be an athlete as long as possible, up until they became parents. And so they dropped their dreams for their children.
author: Jessica McDonald

quote: I have four sisters at home, and both my mom and dad worked, and both of them took care of us. It wasn't like my mom was fully domestic, or my dad was fully domestic: they were just equals in their relationship. So I grew up with the perspective that women should be pursuing their dreams and not have to depend on a guy.
author: Daya

quote: I urge everyone who believes in what we're doing, or wants to believe in dreams coming true, to support AEW by spreading the word and passing the wrestling bug onto someone else.
author: Tony Khan

quote: We had common interests in the beauty of the French language. We both had a tremendous love of jazz. We shared dreams of getting married and having a family, living in the country, leading an idyllic life.
author: David Amram

quote: I believe people have to follow their dreams - I did.
author: Larry Ellison

quote: When I was 16, I was like any other boy at that age who dreams of having a good physique.
author: Rohit Shetty
